title: Why does leaver buster punish people who aren't the leaver?
body: In queue with a m8 who has a 5 min leaver buster queue wait thing and that's fine with me however while I wait for the timer I can't access anything like GD chat or shop etc. I can understand making everyone who queues with a leaver having to wait but to also make it so anyone queuing with a leaver can't do anything on the client seems a bit far.

replies.body:
I think its like this to further punish the leaver, for example a friend might not want to wait 10-20 min for a 30 min game so they dont Q with their buddy which means not only does the leaver have to wait 20 min but he is exiled from playing with his friends too,
i personally wait for my friends but considering how non-tolerant everyone on Lol is i doubt most people will do the same

i do not agree with the leaver buster system.

you can do stuff if its the leave b4 the game starts one as it keeps ticking even when its not up. if its the low priority for leaving to many games in progress then ye you do have to wait which sucks
Riot has a narrow outlook on things so they were unable to format the system to fit the communities needs.
